Welcome to my Webpage

My Name is Kevin Queen. I have been interested in technology and computers for as long as I can remember. I have worked in the support side of technology for the last about 10 years supporting all OS and software commonly used in business as well as some specialty equipment used in the medical field. I decided it was time to move on and into the code monkey side again and become a full stack developer. I originally started the process of going back to college, and isntead decided to do a bootcamp as I am already familiar with HTML/CSS and JavaScript.
